explanation: The stage direction 'Il donne à son maître le reçu de Rosalie' describes a character performing a delivery action specifically involving handing an object (the receipt) to another character (his master). This fits the category of delivery as it focuses on the manner of giving an item rather than any aggression or interaction beyond the act of delivery itself.
stgdir: Il donne à son maître le reçu de Rosalie.
